actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to eliminate certain minimum periods of service required of a veteran with respect to a eligibility for a veteran's pension.

summary.text: Removes the military service time requirements for qualification as a veteran of the Indian Wars, Mexican Border period, World Wars I and II, the Korean conflict or the Vietnam era. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 101, 511, 512, 521 and 532)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to eliminate certain minimum periods of service required of a veteran with respect to a eligibility for a veteran's pension.
